attributes.action: to stop spending public money on useless things and stop the country from going Bankrupt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to stop the government wasting public money on useless things when the country is going into Bankruptcy. They need to stop the spending and try and sort this mess that the banking system has become in the UK. We should stop following US banking practices and take an example of other Europran Countries.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
